kv7.4:2.4: Dānaṃ aniṭṭhaphalaṃ akantaphalaṃ amanuññaphalaṃ secanakaphalaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākanti?
kv7.4:2.6: nanu dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?
kv7.4:2.8: Hañci dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv7.4:3.1: ☒ Dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, cīvaraṃ dānanti?
kv7.4:3.3: Cīvaraṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?
kv7.4:3.5: dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, piṇḍapāto senāsanaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro dānanti?
kv7.4:3.7: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro iṭṭhaphalo kantaphalo manuññaphalo asecanakaphalo sukhudrayo sukhavipākoti?
kv7.4:7.5: “pañcimāni, bhikkhave, dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṃsaññāni porāṇāni asaṃkiṇṇāni asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni, na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv7.4:7.7: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti.
kv7.4:7.8: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ deti averaṃ deti abyābajjhaṃ deti.
kv7.4:7.9: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā averaṃ datvā abyābajjhaṃ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti.
kv7.4:7.10: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ dānaṃ mahādānaṃ aggaññaṃ rattaññaṃ vaṃsaññaṃ porāṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇapubbaṃ, na saṃkiyati na saṅkiyissati, appaṭikuṭṭhaṃ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv7.4:7.11: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako adinnādānaṃ pahāya …pe…
kv7.4:7.15: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ deti averaṃ deti abyābajjhaṃ deti.
kv7.4:7.16: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā averaṃ datvā abyābajjhaṃ datvā aparimāṇassa abhayassa averassa abyābajjhassa bhāgī hoti.
kv7.4:7.17: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamaṃ dānaṃ mahādānaṃ aggaññaṃ rattaññaṃ vaṃsaññaṃ porāṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaṃ asaṃkiṇṇapubbaṃ, na saṃkiyati na saṅkiyissati, appaṭikuṭṭhaṃ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
kv7.4:7.18: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca dānāni mahādānāni aggaññāni rattaññāni vaṃsaññāni porāṇāni asaṃkiṇṇāni asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni, na saṃkiyanti na saṅkiyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhāni samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti.
kv7.4:8.5: “idhekacco annaṃ deti, pānaṃ deti, vatthaṃ deti, yānaṃ deti, mālaṃ deti, gandhaṃ deti, vilepanaṃ deti, seyyaṃ deti, āvasathaṃ deti, padīpeyyaṃ detī”ti.
kv7.4:9.3: Deyyadhammo iṭṭhaphalo kantaphalo manuññaphalo asecanakaphalo sukhudrayo sukhavipākoti?
kv7.4:9.5: dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, cīvaraṃ dānanti?
kv7.4:9.7: Cīvaraṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?
kv7.4:9.9: dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, piṇḍapāto dānaṃ …
kv7.4:9.13: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro iṭṭhaphalo kantaphalo manuññaphalo asecanakaphalo sukhudrayo sukhavipākoti?
